data.text:
@the_moviebob I vaguely recall a movie from that era that ended with a woman getting the man arrested  by going "🎵bet you can't rape me🎵" and him going  "can too" but the cops where on the way.

But I mean, played like him getting dragged away for raping was a clever trick he fell into.
@the_moviebob I honestly think Verhoeven is my favorite director. I just saw Starship Troopers in the big screen and it was amazing
